full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice: S77 3rd Floor Self-Contained Autoclaves

**Notice Number:** PW-22-01006558  
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-08  
**Closing Date:** 2022-10-03T14:00:00  
**Amendment Number:** 2  
**Note:** The notice has expired.

**Description:**
The National Research Council Canada, located at 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON, seeks proposals for the replacement of existing central-sourced autoclaves on the third floor of Building S77 with three self-generating steam autoclaves.

**Key Project Requirements:**

* Obtain and review tender documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca TMA services provider
* Complete a mandatory site visit, attending one of the sessions on September 13th and 15th at 1:00 pm
* Sign an attendance form during the site visit
* Meet WSIB (Workplace Safety and Insurance Board) requirements

**Security Clearance Requirements:**
Contractors must hold:

* A valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD)
* A valid RELIABILITY STATUS for personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites

**Queries and Correspondence:**
Address all questions and concerns to the Departmental Representative (Allan Smith, [Allan.Smith@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Allan.Smith@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)) or the Contracting Authority (Collin Long, [Collin.Long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Collin.Long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)).
